A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Too long and incoherent.
Laura Dern's character might have been interesting
But has no depth (a certain battle is mentioned\, but then dismissed)... 
Why are the Dark Side leaders so stupid?
Particularly Kylo's inability to sense Luke's location.
But clueless Snope comes pretty close.
The Yoda ghost is a giggling waste of screen time.
The love triangle (rectangle if we include The Kyle-Rey  connection is awful\, and undermines Finn's loyalty to Rey... maybe he's her brother?? That would be truly idiotic)
Why is the collector from GOTG in this movie?
We'll\, at least there are enough throwaway characters and cuddly creatures to support the merchandising strategy.

The political stuff in the casino is fine\, but the war profiteers are too boring.. nothing like Jabba ... Also\, a place like the casino should be crawling with double agents and other types of casual betrayal... The setting has been done better (and to death) in every Bond film.

Finally\, the 19th century London street urchins are nauseating.... complete with their secret membership rings and twig brooms.
